mapper.select: SELECT s.* FROM SCHEDULE s INNER JOIN USER u ON s.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE u.DEPARTMENT_ID = #{department_id} ORDER BY s.SCHEDULE_START_DATE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET schedule_name = #{schedule_name}, schedule_start_date = #{schedule_start_date}, schedule_end_date = #{schedule_end_date}, department_id = #{department_id}, job_position_id = #{job_position_id}, user_id = #{user_id} WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no}
